TopicTitle: [0.25] Tracking Station Utils v0.2 - this is a test

Articles.Content:
Because it was annoying to not be able to rename/change vessel type if it had no batteries or crew.

okay, turns out that you could rename your vessels from the TS, silly me. Now this plugin is about showing vessel's information in the tracking station.

Features

 

  • See vessel's part list.
  • See vessel's resources.
  • See vessel's (or celestial body) orbit parameters.

 

Javascript is disabled. View full album

 

 

Requires Blizzy's toolbar

Download

GitHub repository

 

 

Sources are in the zip file and in github.

Edited December 2, 2015 by m4v

Uh...you can do that in stock Tracking Station. Just click the "i" icon and rename the vessel. No crew or battery power required. Although I have lots of mods, I don't believe any has added that function.

that said, the info you show in the other images may be of value.

Edited August 19, 2014 by Apollo13

Uh...you can do that in stock Tracking Station. Just click the "i" icon and rename the vessel. No crew or battery power required. Although I have lots of mods, I don't believe any has added that function.

that said, the info you show in the other images may be of value.

Damn first time I see it, is this documented? I asked around in IRC and couldn't find a way.

Oh well, no matter.

Yeah, my sympathies but this is indeed already a stock feature. If you click the "i" and then click the name of the ship in the small orange bar, you can rename any object, including flags, debris, and asteroids, and you can change the vessel type too.

Yeah, my sympathies but this is indeed already a stock feature. If you click the "i" and then click the name of the ship in the small orange bar, you can rename any object, including flags, debris, and asteroids, and you can change the vessel type too.

Indeed, I'll just remove that in a later update and leave the other features.

I'm not sure if you saw the other mod that accomplished what the other features of this are (resource view in tracking station), but what are the chances the visuals could be tweaked to be a bit more ... stock-ish? They're somewhat off. Do appreciate having this functionality again though.

What are the other features besides the redundant one mentioned in the OP?

:/

What are the other features?

And @ Kyle = look at the pictures in the OP; you can see resource and parts lists in the tracking centre - that's still not stock, although partly done before as well, as Jaxx pointed out.
Do you plan to update this useful mod for KSP 0.25 ?

Do you plan to update this useful mod for KSP 0.25 ?

I believe it works in 0.25? I kinda do have to update it though...

okay, updated


Version 0.2
-----------

* Remove redundant rename feature.
* Display orbit parameters.
what are the chances you could get this to fit on the stockapplauncher as an option? ? thanks for updating otherwise

what are the chances you could get this to fit on the stockapplauncher as an option? ? thanks for updating otherwise

not very high, I'm lazy.
